text.div: StructureDefinition for DocumentManifest as represented in the Provide and Query interactions in the IHE IT Infrastructure Technical Framework Supplement Mobile access to Health Documents (MHD) Rev. 3.1. The IHE MHD Profile text is Normative, this conformance resource is Informative.

title.value: IHE MHD Profile on DocumentManifest for Comprehensive Metadata (SubmissionSet)

description.value: Profile on DocumentManifest based on IHE IT Infrastructure Technical Framework Supplement - Mobile access to Health Documents (MHD) Rev. 3.1. See http://wiki.ihe.net/index.php/Mobile_access_to_Health_Documents_(MHD) The IHE MHD Profile text is Normative, this conformance resource is Informative.
